name: Knight
message: Hey you rat, get back what you stole

name: Ragged child
message: A knight? here, in the rathole? you came to tax our people, dont you?

name: Knight
message: And what if I did? come on, give me the purse or you will regret it

name: Traveler
message: This is not necessary Sir, I just borrowed him my purse

name: Knight
message: Ha ha ha, you wont trick me... now I will take that purse

name: ERROR
message: If you are seeing this message something went bad
